derivation: a primitive root (rather identical with H5382 (נָשָׁה), in the sense of H5378 (נָשָׁא));
outline:
1. to lend, be a creditor
    1. (Qal)
      1. to lend
      2. creditor (participle) (subst)
    2. (Hiphil) to lend
kjv_def: creditor, exact, extortioner, lend, usurer, lend on (taker on) usury.
strongs_def: to lend or (by reciprocity) borrow on security or interest
